title: Audiophile
description: Audiophile is created to provide a platform for purchasing earphones, earbuds, and speakers online. Its goal is to enhance the shopping experience by incorporating interactive features and a modern technological touch, By leveraging these cutting-edge technologies, Audiophile website is able to deliver a responsive, feature-rich, and modern shopping experience to its users. The website is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, with a sleek and contemporary interface that enhances the overall shopping experience..

title: Delicious App
description: The app utilizes the Recipe API to furnish comprehensive recipe information, comprising both ingredients and instructions. Additionally, the app incorporates an array of filter options catering to diverse culinary cultures such as Italian, American, Thai, and Japanese cuisines. The application also offers a random recipe search feature, enhancing user experience by providing a convenient means of discovering new and exciting recipes.

title: Todo List App
description: The Todo List App project is a visually stunning task management application built using JavaScript with an animated user interface. It offers a straightforward yet powerful solution for organizing and storing all your to-do items through the use of local storage. With this intuitive app, you can ensure that every hour of your day is productive and efficient. It also allows you to keep track of all your essential appointments within a standard 9-5 workday.

title: Room
description: Room is a furniture and life style landing page that showcases the brand's main products with detailed descriptions, allowing customers to make informed and quick purchasing decisions. The sleek and modern design ensures a seamless browsing experience. Helpful resources such as customer reviews, product specifications, and frequently asked questions are also provided. Room's landing page instills confidence in potential buyers, helping them make informed decisions. Overall, the user-friendly landing page is designed to attract and retain customers, while enhancing the shopping experience.

title: NASIMS Clone
description: This is replica of existing National Social Investment Management System (NASIMS) website design and content. This was achieved using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap

title: Countdown Timer
description: The project aims to develop a JavaScript-based Countdown Timer that serves as a versatile tool for keeping track of significant events and dates in an individual's life. Users will be able to set reminders for important appointments, milestones, and occasions, ensuring they never miss out on any significant day. The timer will provide an intuitive and user-friendly interface, allowing users to keep track of multiple events simultaneously.

title: Guess My Number
description: Guess My Number is a fun and interactive game that utilizes the basic principles of JavaScript. The game offers you the opportunity to guess a random number within 10 attempts, and your remaining chances will determine your final score. To enhance the competition, the game also saves the player's highest score.

title: Meet Landing Page
description: GMeet is a social app landing page designed with React that can be use for booking meetings with your business partners and friends, as well as save personal notes.
